sentences.en: A few diseases, such as cystic fibrosis and sickle cell anemia, are caused by a single SNP.
sentences.cn: 一些疾病，比如囊肿性纤维化和镰状细胞性贫血是由一种SNP引起的。

sentences.en: At medium power , nodular sclerosing Hodgkin's disease has prominent bands of fibrosis.
sentences.cn: 中倍镜下结节硬化型霍奇金淋巴瘤有明显的纤维束.

sentences.en: Cardiac fibrosis is the characteristic of the diabetic cardiomyopathy.
sentences.cn: 心肌纤维化是其重要的病理改变.

sentences.en: CONCLUSION CCB has definitely therapeutic effect on liver fibrosis.
sentences.cn: 结论:CCB对肝纤维化有治疗作用.

sentences.en: Cystic fibrosis is the commonest fatal here-ditary disease.
sentences.cn: 囊性纤维化是最常见的致命遗传疾病。

sentences.en: Expression of MMP - 13 , MMP - 2 , MT - MMP 2 were decreased gradually in fibrosis reversal.
Following chronic liver injury of any etiology, there is progressive fibrosis.
sentences.cn: 任何病因导致的慢性肝损伤, 均可发展为肝纤维化.

sentences.en: Gall - blader disease and cystic fibrosis also often involve me.
sentences.cn: 胆囊疾病和胰腺囊性纤维性变也常常纠缠我.

sentences.en: HSCs are the major cell type involved in liver fibrosis, which is the formation of scar tissue in response to liver damage.
sentences.cn: 肝星状细胞是一种与肝纤维化密切相关的主要的细胞种类，它在肝受到损伤时形成瘢痕组织。

sentences.en: In workplace settings sulfuric acid mists lead to pulmonary fibrosis, and some have suggested lung cancer as another outcome.
sentences.cn: 在工厂设施中，硫酸尘雾导致肺纤维化。 一些人已经表示肺癌是它的另一后果。

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the pathogenesis of oral submucous fibrosis.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨口腔黏膜下纤维性变(OSF) 可能的发病机理.

sentences.en: Objective : To probe the action mechanism of anti - liver fibrosis of Wumei Pill.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨乌梅丸 抗 肝纤维化的作用机理.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the mechanism of fibrosis in autoimmune hepatitis ( AIH ).
sentences.cn: 目的　探讨自身免疫性肝炎 ( AIH ) 肝纤维化的机制.

sentences.en: Objective To explore whether ammonium perchlorate ( AP ) could cause animal pulmonary fibrosis.
sentences.cn: 探讨过氯酸铵 ( AP ) 致动物肺纤维化作用.

sentences.en: Oral fibrosis can cause betel nut chewing and mouth.
sentences.cn: 吃槟榔会导致口腔纤维化,口腔癌.

sentences.en: Preoperative radiation therapy causes tissue fibrosis and interferes with wound healing.
sentences.cn: 而术前放射治疗会引起组织纤维化并干扰伤口愈合.

sentences.en: The fibrosis around a breast implant may produce deformity and pain in some women.
sentences.cn: 乳腺植入物周围的纤维化可能在某些妇女中引起变形与疼痛。

sentences.en: The study was funded in part by the Cystic Fibrosis Foundation.
sentences.cn: 此项研究是由囊性纤维化基金会部分资助.

sentences.en: These morphologic changes provide basis for formation of idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.
sentences.cn: 上述形态学改变对特发性肺纤维化的形成提供了一些依据.

words.tran_cn: 纤维的，纤维性的；纤维状的
[基医] 纤维原细胞；纤维组织母细胞
子宫肌瘤；[肿瘤] 纤维瘤

trans.tran_en: the formation of an abnormal amount of fibrous tissue in an organ or part as the result of inflammation, irritation, or healing
